data.text: @LeslieGRolfe @HealthNS Are you a scientist or just someone who reads what they want and not facts
@FallenGirl902 @HealthNS Maybe you should do some research on what this vaccine really is and stop commenting. Wakey wakey!
@FallenGirl902 @HealthNS Obviously you don’t get that I don’t care about your vaccine research! Keep getting your boosters and take mine while you’re at it!

@LeslieGRolfe @HealthNS Then learn to read. They don't stop you from getting it. It lessens the effect it has on YOU. It doesn't stop the spread. Obviously you need to do more research on vaccines and their purposes. https://t.co/bUjs5GqGrb
@LeslieGRolfe @scotian_soldier @HealthNS Then Don't get vaccinated. No one is holding you at force and jabbing you with a needle.
@Patrici33944223 @scotian_soldier @HealthNS And FYI I don’t need nor want your sympathy!!! 😂😂

@Patrici33944223 @scotian_soldier @HealthNS No majority rules in an election! I have the freedom of choice on what goes in my body and it’s a big hell no! So stop trying to shove your beliefs down my throat!
@FallenGirl902 @HealthNS Oh I’ve done my research! Why don’t you!

@LeslieGRolfe @scotian_soldier @HealthNS You don't help your cause with insults. People would have more sympathy if you weren't insulting and forcing them to to follow your beliefs. approx. 2.5% of eligible people in this province is not vaccinated. It's a democracy - majority rules.
